mapper.insert: insert into csreply (rno, csbno, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{csbno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update csreply set reply = #{reply},updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, csbno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from csreply where csbno = #{csbno} order by rno asc
